name: meteorite-shard
effect: Causes the Meteorite to transform to its final form, allowing Rayquaza to Mega Evolve.
short_effect: Causes the Meteorite to transform to its final form, allowing Rayquaza to Mega Evolve.

flavor_text.sun_moon: One of the fragments of a Meteorite from Granite Cave. It’s faintly warm to the touch.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: One of the fragments of a Meteorite from Granite Cave. It’s faintly warm to the touch.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: One of the fragments of a Meteorite from Granite Cave. It’s faintly warm to the touch.
